title: Test Login Successful
manualSteps: 1. Open a browser and navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/
2. Verify that the page title is 'Swag Labs' and both username and password fields are visible.
3. Click inside the Username input field (placeholder='Username').
4. Type the exact text standard_user into the Username field and confirm the value is entered correctly.
5. Click inside the Password input field (placeholder='Password').
6. Type the exact text secret_sauce into the Password field (value will be masked).
8. Wait for the browser to load the next page.
10. Confirm that the inventory page header (e.g., 'Products') is displayed, indicating a successful login.
